did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Scrapbook containing one large print of two women in swimming suits and saddle shoes next to a car and 30 photographs of a variety of adult women and one girl. Includes photographs of couples hugging on the couch, dancing, and holding each other. In most pictures, the women are wearing pants. Several pictures are taken by a Christmas tree. Includes several photos of women dressed in costumes. Believed to be from Baltimore, Maryland.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Scrapbook containing one large print of two women in swimming suits and saddle shoes next to a car and 30 photographs of a variety of adult women and one girl. Includes photographs of couples hugging on the couch, dancing, and holding each other. In most pictures, the women are wearing pants. Several pictures are taken by a Christmas tree. Includes several photos of women dressed in costumes. Believed to be from Baltimore, Maryland.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Maryland Lesbian Photo Album, #7727. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
